name: Claustro Escalade
description:
Description

You are trapped in an enclosed space. You need to get out of here or your mind could not take it. What are those floating things up there? Maybe if I shoot them down it could take my mind off of this claustrophobic environment. Still, I need to get out of this place.

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Escape - Exit game
